column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. OBJECTIVE ONE CLEARED AND SECURED. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE SECURED SECOND OBJECTIVE. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE SECURED 3RD OBJECTIVE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER THAT. OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. UNDERSTOOD, GOOD WORK. OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. WE COPY, GOOD WORK. OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. WELCOME BACK. MISSION IS ACCOMPLISHED. OUT.
